note.p: Death: Selbourne Cottage, Hassocks, Sussex (30 July 1892)
Education: Kingswood; St John's College, Cambridge. BA (1840), MA (1843), LLD (1869)

Career: Ordained Deacon (1843), ordained Priest (1844); Curate, Darley Abbey, Derbyshire (1843-1853); Perpetual Curate, Trinity Chapel, Brighton (1853-1856); Headmaster, Brighton College (1856-1871); Vicar, Sandridge, Hertfordshire, where he restored the church and almost rebuilt the village (1872-1891)
